Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 8.1.6

==Policy Statement==

Lock-out attacked accounts.

==Policy Purpose==

Locking the terminal after repeated failed authentication attempts ensures that an attacker cannot guess the password in a timely manner.

==Related Guidance==

* [[90ee4a94-47e5-4d8f-a576-632602861442|Lock Accounts After Multiple Failed Authentication Attempts]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[14a7c12b-46dd-4ee5-9ebf-8b9497ab7ce3|Accounts Are Locked After Multiple Failed Authentication Attempts]]
